item.title: Covenant, Donut, TikiTorch
item.description: Covenant v0.1 was first released in February 2019 and has since received a lot of really good updates. v0.2 was released in May which added p2p comms over SMB named pipes, and v0.3 was released in August which added a brand new web interface. Even though it’s such a young project, it has really proven itself to be a capable tool for offensive operators. I’ve not taken a look at Covenant since v0.1.x but since providing some new additions to SharpSploit, it kinda got my geek going. One of my areas of interest is weaponising the Grunt stager.

item.title: TikiSpawn & MSBuild
item.description: The main impetus behind this post was me experimenting with ways to leverage TikiSpawn with some of the popular lolbins.
